prompts.title: Fashion product collage
prompts.system: Create a fashion product collage on a brown corkboard based on this outfit. Each product and the central model image should be presented as individual photos with distinct white borders, pinned organically and aesthetically to the board with small descriptive labels. Format 16:9.

prompts.title: Fashion editorial grid
prompts.system: Create [[V1:9]] stunning fashion shots as if they’re from an award-winning fashion editorial. Use this reference as the brand style but add nuance and variety to the range so they convey a professional design touch. Please generate [[V1:9]] images in a grid format.

prompts.title: Hairstyle collage
prompts.system: Create a grid of [[V1:9]] different hairstyles for this woman. List the name of each hairstyle and the brief history about the hairstyle. They can be from any era.

prompts.title: Outfit history
prompts.system: Create a grid of [[V1:9]] images. In each section, style me according that time period. Start from [[V2:1920's]], List the time period on each image.

prompts.title: Series knolling image
prompts.system: A knolling image of items from the series [[V1:Breaking Bad]].

prompts.title: Drink recipe infographic
prompts.system: You are the world's best mixologist. Create a hyper-realistic detailed recipe infographic showcasing a single, perfect [[V1:pisco sour]]. Include detailed labels and a fotorealistic image of the final drink.

prompts.title: Lore image
prompts.system: Create an image with a lore behind this image. Include text explaining it.

prompts.title: Droste effect
prompts.system: Droste effect of [[V1:painter painting himself]]

prompts.title: Illustrated glowing eyes
prompts.system: Add illustrated googly eyes and stick hands on the [[V1:woman]] in an exaggerated comedic pose

prompts.title: Dieline 3D box
prompts.system: Assemble the dieline into a perfectly folded 3D box with accurate panel placement, clean edges, and undistorted typography. Preserve all artwork exactly as printed on the dieline. Render the box in a minimal, high-end studio setup on a soft neutral background with gentle diffused lighting, subtle shadows, and no extra props. Show the box upright in a refined ¾ angle. Ultra-realistic detail, true colors, matte paperboard texture, crisp folds, premium editorial aesthetic.

prompts.title: Dieline 2D box
prompts.system: Deconstruct this 3D product packaging photo into a precise, flattened 2D dieline template. Unfold the box into a complete technical net structure, revealing all panels, including previously hidden dust flaps, tucks, and glue tabs. Eliminate all perspective and lens distortion to create a perfect orthographic top-down view. Retain the exact high-fidelity texture and typography from the original photo but map it accurately onto the flat surface. Superimpose clean, technical die-cut lines (solid) and fold lines (dashed) in a contrasting color. Isolated on a pure white background, shadowless, print-ready production quality

prompts.title: Linkedin career map
prompts.system: This is my LinkedIn profile data with extra details. Be creative with my career and imagine my work history in a new imaginative ways. Create my career map in the [[V1:Lord of the rings]] style. Add allusions or metaphors that connect my resume to your chosen theme, so the career map feels coherent. Write all text legibly and clearly. [[V2:My work history]]

prompts.title: Character design sheet
prompts.system: Please create a detailed character design sheet of the person in this photo. It will be used in a live-action movie, so be careful not to make it look like anime-style artwork. Be sure to structure it with the following three character elements: - A turnaround (three-view) sheet showing the character from multiple angles - An expression sheet showing basic emotional states such as joy, sadness, anger, surprise, fear, and neutral - A pose sheet showing typical actions, such as the character running, jumping, laughing, and crying. Once it is created, remove the original image of the person.

prompts.title: Handwritten notes
prompts.system: Write as many cute handwritten notes and highlights as possible on the photo!

prompts.title: Editorial photoshoot collage
prompts.system:
Using the provided reference photo from this photoshoot, create a single ultra-high-resolution 4K image that is a 3×3 grid of 9 frames, all exactly the same size and perfectly aligned, filling the entire canvas. Do not add borders, frames, grid lines, or gaps between frames. The content in each frame can show different poses, angles, or parts of the environment, but each frame must respect its own rectangular area so the image can be cleanly cropped into equal parts.

Keep the main character completely consistent across all 9 tiles:
- same face and facial features as the reference
- same hairstyle and hair color
- same outfit, accessories, and overall styling
- same location and general background
- consistent lighting and color grading

Style: professional editorial / fashion photography, magazine cover quality, sharp focus, natural but refined retouching, no text, no watermarks, no logos.

Within the 9 tiles, show a variety of polished editorial poses and camera angles:
- mix of full-body, three-quarter, and close-up portraits
- a range of confident, expressive poses (walking, turning, leaning, seated, etc.)
- slightly different framing and compositions in each tile
- subtle variations in facial expression (soft smile, serious, looking away, looking into the camera)

Everything should feel like the final selects from a high-end fashion photoshoot.

prompts.title: Blooper photoshoot collage
prompts.system:
Using the provided reference photo from this photoshoot, create a single ultra-high-resolution 4K image that is a 3×3 grid of 9 frames, all exactly the same size and perfectly aligned, filling the entire canvas. Do not add borders, frames, grid lines, or gaps between frames. The content in each frame can show different poses, angles, or parts of the environment, but each frame must respect its own rectangular area so the image can be cleanly cropped into equal parts.

Keep the main character completely consistent across all 9 tiles:
- same face and facial features as the reference
- same hairstyle and hair color
- same outfit, accessories, and overall styling
- same location and general background
- consistent lighting and color grading

Style: professional editorial photography but with playful, candid moments, sharp focus, no text, no watermarks, no logos.

Within the 9 tiles, show fun blooper / outtake moments from the shoot:
- laughing, mid-blink, talking, unposed reactions
- slightly awkward poses, almost losing balance, fixing hair or outfit
- unexpected expressions, looking at the crew or off-camera
- tiny imperfections like motion blur in hands or hair flying a bit
- genuine, unpolished expressions that still look visually appealing

Overall mood: lighthearted, behind-the-scenes personality, as if capturing the funny in-between moments of the session.

prompts.title: Behind-the-scenes photoshoot collage
prompts.system:
Using the provided reference photo from this photoshoot, create a single ultra-high-resolution 4K image that is a 3×3 grid of 9 frames, all exactly the same size and perfectly aligned, filling the entire canvas. Do not add borders, frames, grid lines, or gaps between frames. The content in each frame can show different poses, angles, or parts of the environment, but each frame must respect its own rectangular area so the image can be cleanly cropped into equal parts.

Keep the main character completely consistent across all 9 tiles:
- same face and facial features as the reference
- same hairstyle and hair color
- same outfit, accessories, and overall styling
- same location and general background
- consistent lighting and color grading

Style: documentary-style behind-the-scenes photography with a cinematic look, sharp focus on the subject, no text, no watermarks, no logos.

Within the 9 tiles, show behind-the-scenes moments from the photoshoot:
- the character interacting with the crew, photographer, or camera
- the character getting makeup or hair touch-ups
- standing near lighting equipment, softboxes, light stands, reflectors
- posing near the camera on a tripod, monitor screens, cables, set elements
- candid setup moments: checking shots on a monitor, adjusting lights, walking onto set

The collage should feel like a genuine look at how the professional photoshoot was created.

prompts.title: Lighting variation editorial collage

Using the provided reference photo from this photoshoot, create a single ultra-high-resolution 4K image that is a 3×3 grid of 9 frames, all exactly the same size and perfectly aligned, filling the entire canvas. Do not add borders, frames, grid lines, or gaps between frames. Style: cinematic editorial photography with subtle lighting variation, sharp focus, no text, no watermarks, no logos.

Within the 9 tiles, explore subtle lighting and mood variations while staying within the same scene:
- some tiles with softer, more diffused light
- some tiles with more dramatic contrast or side lighting
- slight changes in shadow direction and intensity
- a mix of close-ups and mid-shots to show how the light shapes the face and outfit

The collage should feel like a series of lighting tests and variations from the same professional photoshoot.

Within the 9 tiles, show moments that feel like test shots and in-between frames:

The collage should look like authentic test frames captured before choosing the final hero images.

prompts.title: Intimate portrait collage
prompts.system:
Using the provided reference photo from this photoshoot, create a single ultra-high-resolution 4K image that is a 3×3 grid of 9 frames, all exactly the same size and perfectly aligned, filling the entire canvas. Do not add borders, frames, grid lines, or gaps between frames. The content in each frame can show different poses, angles, or parts of the environment, but each frame must respect its own rectangular area so the image can be cleanly cropped into equal parts.

Keep the main character completely consistent across all 9 tiles:
- same face and facial features as the reference
- same hairstyle and hair color
- same outfit, accessories, and overall styling
- consistent lighting and color grading

Style: cinematic, intimate portrait photography with soft, directional lighting and shallow depth of field, no text, no watermarks, no logos.

Within the 9 tiles, focus on close portraits and cropped compositions: face, shoulders, hands, and upper body framed in artistic ways. Show subtle changes in expression—thoughtful, dreamy, playful, slightly serious—while keeping the overall mood soft, elegant, and atmospheric. Avoid any explicit nudity or overly revealing clothing; keep it refined and fashion-focused.

Within the 9 tiles, show a variety of elegant poses and angles: walking as if on a red carpet, turning slightly, looking back over the shoulder, interacting with the outfit (adjusting a sleeve, holding a clutch, arranging jewelry, etc.). Use compositions that feel luxurious and glamorous but keep the outfit tasteful and fully covering, in line with mainstream fashion editorials.

Emphasize composition, geometry, and mood rather than revealing detail. The images should feel atmospheric and suggestive in tone but remain fully SFW and fashion-oriented.

Keep the wardrobe modest and tasteful, like loungewear or casual fashion, and focus on mood, comfort, and personality rather than explicit exposure.

prompts.title: Cropped fashion details with attitude
prompts.system:
Using the provided reference photo from this photoshoot, create a single ultra-high-resolution 4K image that is a 3×3 grid of 9 frames, all exactly the same size and perfectly aligned, filling the entire canvas. Do not add borders, frames, grid lines, or gaps between frames. The content in each frame can show different poses, angles, or parts of the environment, but each frame must respect its own rectangular area so the image can be cleanly cropped into equal parts.

Keep the main character and styling consistent across all 9 tiles:
- same outfit, accessories, and overall look
- consistent lighting and color grading

Style: bold fashion detail photography with strong composition and a confident attitude, no text, no watermarks, no logos.

Within the 9 tiles, show tightly cropped shots that highlight attitude and styling: hands in pockets, crossed arms, a turned shoulder, the curve of the back outlined by the outfit, feet stepping, the tilt of the head and neck, the way fabric folds and drapes, etc. Keep all crops clearly within tasteful fashion norms and avoid any explicit focus on private areas. The images should feel bold, confident, and slightly suggestive in mood while staying fully SFW.

prompts.title: Vertical character turnaround with face close-up
prompts.system:
Using the provided hero reference photo (and optional separate face close-up), create a single ultra-high-resolution vertical 9:16 image that is a 2×2 grid collage (4 portrait-oriented frames, equal size). Arrange the image as a 2×2 grid of 4 frames, equal size and perfectly aligned, filling the entire vertical canvas. Do not add borders, frames, grid lines, or gaps between frames; each frame must stay inside its own rectangle so the image can be cropped into four equal parts.

Goal: generate a consistent character turnaround pack from the same person and outfit, plus a detailed face reference, all in a vertical format.

Keep the main character 100% consistent across all 4 frames:
- identical face and facial features as the hero image (and any provided face close-up)
- identical hairstyle: length, color, parting, volume, and hairline
- identical outfit: same cut, fit, patterns, seams, straps, belts, and accessories
- identical body type, proportions, and skin tone
- consistent lighting and color grading. Backgrounds and environment elements may vary slightly but must look like the same photoshoot.

Style: neutral, reference-style character photography suitable for use as a model sheet, clean and readable, no text, no watermarks, no logos.

Arrange the 4 frames inside the vertical canvas as follows:
- Top-left: full-body front view, matching the hero image as closely as possible (same pose, same expression), framed vertically.
- Top-right: full-body 3/4 or profile view from one side, clearly showing the side of the outfit and hair.
- Bottom-left: full-body back view, clearly showing the back of the outfit and hairstyle.
- Bottom-right: tight vertical face close-up portrait (head and upper shoulders), focused on accurate likeness, skin details, and hairline.

Pose: relaxed neutral stance, arms naturally at the sides (not blocking the outfit), minimal expression changes. The purpose of this collage is to serve as a consistent multi-angle and close-up reference of the same character and outfit for future vertical content generations.

Negative: borders, frames, grid lines, white margins, overlapping frames, distorted anatomy, inconsistent outfits or hairstyles.

prompts.title: Replace screen face with photorealistic human face
prompts.system: Replace the digital screen face with a photorealistic human face. The face should have: fair skin with natural freckles, blue-green eyes, soft natural eyebrows, subtle pink lips with a gentle smile, and natural skin texture. The face should match the lighting and angle of the original image, appearing as a real person wearing the pink wig and pearl necklace. Keep the same facial expression (slight smile, forward gaze). Seamlessly blend the face with the visible neck and maintain all other elements unchanged. Photorealistic, natural skin tones, proper lighting integration.
